<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringbase/#a35dc101b509721ffbfb58aba316de681">TargetLoweringBase::LegalizeTypeAction</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><span class="doxyHighlight">WebAssemblyTargetLowering::getPreferredVectorAction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt">MVT</a> VT)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#a98049e07856ff1288295bc58e232518b">isFixedLengthVector</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MVT EltVT = VT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mvt/#ad3ff408f213bef998f49952c6c3711fb">getVectorElementType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have legal vector types with these lane types, so widening the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vector would let us use some of the lanes directly without having to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// extend or truncate values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EltVT == MVT::i8 || EltVT == MVT::i16 || EltVT == MVT::i32 ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><span class="doxyHighlight">        EltVT == MVT::i64 || EltVT == MVT::f32 || EltVT == MVT::f64)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringbase/#a35dc101b509721ffbfb58aba316de681a5290057031a9bc71850f61e757cb940e">TypeWidenVector</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringbase/#a59ae7f93fccb0ae431e82f8d74ba443c">TargetLoweringBase::getPreferredVectorAction</a>(VT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WebAssemblyTargetLowering::shouldSimplifyDemandedVectorElts(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TargetLoweringOpt &amp;TLO)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ISel process runs DAGCombiner after legalization; this step is called</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SelectionDAG optimization phase. This post-legalization combining process</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// runs DAGCombiner on each node, and if there was a change to be made,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// re-runs legalization again on it and its user nodes to make sure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// everythiing is in a legalized state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The legalization calls lowering routines, and we do our custom lowering for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// build&#95;vectors (LowerBUILD&#95;VECTOR), which converts undef vector elements</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into zeros. But there is a set of routines in DAGCombiner that turns unused</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (= not demanded) nodes into undef, among which SimplifyDemandedVectorElts</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// turns unused vector elements into undefs. But this routine does not work</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with our custom LowerBUILD&#95;VECTOR, which turns undefs into zeros. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// combination can result in a infinite loop, in which undefs are converted to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// zeros in legalization and back to undefs in combining.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// So after DAG is legalized, we prevent SimplifyDemandedVectorElts from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// running for build&#95;vectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getOpcode() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aff6f73b624fecca7dbe94259f9437e32">ISD::BUILD&#95;VECTOR</a> &amp;&amp; TLO.LegalOps &amp;&amp; TLO.LegalTys)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1800"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> WebAssemblyTargetLowering::LowerCopyToReg(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1802"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getOperand(2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1803"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;FrameIndexSDNode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>.getNode())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1804"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CopyToReg nodes don&#39;t support FrameIndex operands. Other targets select</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1805"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the FI to some LEA-like instruction, but since we don&#39;t have that, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1806"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to insert some kind of instruction that can take an FI operand and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2726"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Convert (&#123;u,s&#125;itofp vec) --&gt; (&#123;u,s&#125;itofp (&#123;s,z&#125;ext vec)) so it doesn&#39;t get</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2920"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper to extract VectorWidth bits from Vec, starting from IdxVal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2921" lineLink="#aecabf0b51b7f3a579c05fc08e06c265a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="#aecabf0b51b7f3a579c05fc08e06c265a">extractSubVector</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Vec, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IdxVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp;DAG,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2922"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VectorWidth) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2923"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> VT = Vec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a6b2b8ca5b0fdf6484247d5ae74deb9ff">getValueType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2924"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> ElVT = VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#abc4c6365ade17ad4443ad0e381e7479d">getVectorElementType</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2925"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Factor = VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>() / VectorWidth;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> ResultVT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a210ba6b43ba451b698857dd9de71bd15">EVT::getVectorVT</a>(&#42;DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#adecf615928faed0c8a082ffdb65dfea0">getContext</a>(), ElVT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2927"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  VT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ae245d70802e4ebe1cae2b6122c62a22a">getVectorNumElements</a>() / Factor);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2928"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2929"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extract the relevant VectorWidth bits.  Generate an EXTRACT&#95;SUBVECTOR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ElemsPerChunk = VectorWidth / ElVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2931"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(ElemsPerChunk) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Elements per chunk not power of 2&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2932"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2933"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the index of the first element of the VectorWidth-bit chunk</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2934"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we want. Since ElemsPerChunk is a power of 2 just need to clear bits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2935"><span class="doxyHighlight">  IdxVal &amp;= ~(ElemsPerChunk - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2936"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2937"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the input is a buildvector just emit a smaller one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2938"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Vec.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aff6f73b624fecca7dbe94259f9437e32">ISD::BUILD&#95;VECTOR</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2939"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a5d154312bef0ed1a6bacfcb52b7cf8eb">getBuildVector</a>(ResultVT, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2940"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              Vec-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#a0cdd5176dc41b96586448ecc59770250">ops</a>().slice(IdxVal, ElemsPerChunk));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2941"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2942"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> VecIdx = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#ab85f5fcb2f3bb0aaf83041a41182a2d4">getIntPtrConstant</a>(IdxVal, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a9070de8a5c5b71851732c4c54e2ffedf">ISD::EXTRACT&#95;SUBVECTOR</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, ResultVT, Vec, VecIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2944"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2945"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2946"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper to recursively truncate vector elements in half with NARROW&#95;U. DstVT</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2947"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is the expected destination value type after recursion. In is the initial</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2948"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// input. Note that the input should have enough leading zero bits to prevent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2949"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NARROW&#95;U from saturating results.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2950" lineLink="#af3333c324c5d8907cc8d45bcf3b636eb"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="#af3333c324c5d8907cc8d45bcf3b636eb">truncateVectorWithNARROW</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> DstVT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> In, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdloc">SDLoc</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2951"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag">SelectionDAG</a> &amp;DAG) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2952"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> SrcVT = In.getValueType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2953"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No truncation required, we might get here due to recursive calls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcVT == DstVT)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2956"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> In;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2957"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcSizeInBits = SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElems = SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ae245d70802e4ebe1cae2b6122c62a22a">getVectorNumElements</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(NumElems))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2961"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DstVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#ae245d70802e4ebe1cae2b6122c62a22a">getVectorNumElements</a>() == NumElems &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Illegal truncation&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2963"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SrcSizeInBits &gt; DstVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Illegal truncation&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2964"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2965"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx = &#42;DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#adecf615928faed0c8a082ffdb65dfea0">getContext</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2966"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> PackedSVT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a752372e170e4e7c595bf8810bb52adf2">EVT::getIntegerVT</a>(Ctx, SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>() / 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2967"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2968"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Narrow to the largest type possible:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2969"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vXi64/vXi32 -&gt; i16x8.narrow&#95;i32x4&#95;u and vXi16 -&gt; i8x16.narrow&#95;i16x8&#95;u.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2970"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> InVT = MVT::i16, OutVT = MVT::i8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2971"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a547a88964f1673c84410baa7a2a83f4d">getScalarSizeInBits</a>() &gt; 16) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2972"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InVT = MVT::i32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2973"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OutVT = MVT::i16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2974"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2975"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SubSizeInBits = SrcSizeInBits / 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2976"><span class="doxyHighlight">  InVT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a210ba6b43ba451b698857dd9de71bd15">EVT::getVectorVT</a>(Ctx, InVT, SubSizeInBits / InVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a45e76d44a189e456d52e37ba3dda0fce">getSizeInBits</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2977"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OutVT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a210ba6b43ba451b698857dd9de71bd15">EVT::getVectorVT</a>(Ctx, OutVT, SubSizeInBits / OutVT.getSizeInBits());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2978"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2979"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Split lower/upper subvectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2980"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a> = <a href="#aecabf0b51b7f3a579c05fc08e06c265a">extractSubVector</a>(In, 0, DAG, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, SubSizeInBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a> = <a href="#aecabf0b51b7f3a579c05fc08e06c265a">extractSubVector</a>(In, NumElems / 2, DAG, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, SubSizeInBits);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2982"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2983"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 256bit -&gt; 128bit truncate - Narrow lower/upper 128-bit subvectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2984"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#aacd05b71fb3b325dcc53a7df09d37edb">is256BitVector</a>() &amp;&amp; DstVT.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a6db1f207286bd8bc6a978593a55955e9">is128BitVector</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2985"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a> = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a64f6469ab95c4eec77e4ccf303619a81">getBitcast</a>(InVT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2986"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a> = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a64f6469ab95c4eec77e4ccf303619a81">getBitcast</a>(InVT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2987"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Res = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(WebAssemblyISD::NARROW&#95;U, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, OutVT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2988"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a64f6469ab95c4eec77e4ccf303619a81">getBitcast</a>(DstVT, Res);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2989"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2990"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2991"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recursively narrow lower/upper subvectors, concat result and narrow again.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2992"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt">EVT</a> PackedVT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a210ba6b43ba451b698857dd9de71bd15">EVT::getVectorVT</a>(Ctx, PackedSVT, NumElems / 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2993"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a> = <a href="#af3333c324c5d8907cc8d45bcf3b636eb">truncateVectorWithNARROW</a>(PackedVT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, DAG);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2994"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a> = <a href="#af3333c324c5d8907cc8d45bcf3b636eb">truncateVectorWithNARROW</a>(PackedVT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, DAG);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2995"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2996"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PackedVT = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/evt/#a210ba6b43ba451b698857dd9de71bd15">EVT::getVectorVT</a>(Ctx, PackedSVT, NumElems);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2997"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Res = DAG.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#abad5b17501ce8972fb04a149611e7177">getNode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a320898056eadc3254fc601e1362eb9f5">ISD::CONCAT&#95;VECTORS</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, PackedVT, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>);</span></CodeLine>
